text:
Brightside | financial wellness employee benefit: we help our clients employees reduce their financial stress through various internal methods and external partners.

We are a funded startup with engineering and operations based in Chandler,AZ. Running full on AWS, plus CRM.

Looking for Senior Android, iOS and full stack engineers, NodeJs,Java,Talend a plus.

ONSITE, Full-time, salary +options. Email: dave at gobrightside dot com
